Art. 4.53. 
Administration and liquidation by the heir 
The beneficiary heir is responsible for administering and liquidating the assets of the succession. He is accountable to the creditors and legatees.
He may not compromise, compromise or encumber the assets with mortgages or other encumbrances without the authorisation of the court.
He may only be bound over his personal assets to the extent of the balance he has received.
